The Twitter account: OMFG_America published an audio recording along with the claim that it featured Vice Presidential candidate Tim Kaine and an unnamed mistress.
It was determined that the dialogue in t: known recording of actor Mel Gibson yelling at his former girlfriend, not Tim Kaine.
There is no evidence or accusation of Ti: 4. This is not the first time that audio recordings have circulated falsely attributing them to Tim Kaine, as another instance involved audio of Alec Baldwin yelling at his daughter being shared as if it featured Kaine's voice.
